duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, and manage the implementation of large-scale and complex projects/programs to meet scope, timing, and budget expectations.
Analyze work plans and schedules and develop project progress and status reports, including executive status updates.
Coordinate and facilitate project meetings, develop meeting minutes, and track/manage action items.
Assess/manage risk, impacts, and potential alternatives and escalate as required to the appropriate level of management.
Set program objectives and establish clear measures to successfully define and meet project deliverables and timelines.
Define Key Performance Indicators (KPI), training, process standards, policies, and procedures associated with complex projects.
Ensure adherence to project-related policies and processes, reiterate scope, roles/responsibilities, and schedule on a regular basis.
Identify additional sales opportunities, engage Sales organization as appropriate, and act as a customer-facing single point of contact during the project.
Understand project goals and objectives as it relates to customer’s business strategies and long-term needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree and/or 5+ years of related experience. Project Management Professional or PRINCE2 Certification is preferred. 6+ years in project management experience.
